title: Utility
text: The team envisioned that owners will be able to utilize their NFT in a variety of situations whether it be in a game or as a logo for promotion. While designing the NFT itself and combining the numerous attributes, we aimed to keep the integrity of the overall artwork  aesthetically pleasing so that it would look as clean as possible as a whole, single image. In addition, our all mighty Developer NWX has started the development of creating a game for which owners can use their CFC NFT within the game.
